document_data.mainbody:
Whip of pain was a divine necromancy spell used by priests devoted to Loviatar, enabling them to create a whiplike line of force.
This spell created a thin lines of force extending from the casters fingertips. The whips crackled with purple energy and could strike targets up to  distant. The whips made loud cracking sounds each time they struck and harmed a target, wracking them with intense pain.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required as material components a drop of unholy water and one of the casters hairs to cast.
